name: Caasi II
description:
Caasi is a farming game submitted for the Minimalistic Jam 2.

In this game you run around, fighting annoying weed, harvesting crops and buying epic upgrades.

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Speed Potion: UP KEY
Weed Magnet: LEFT KEY
Diet Potion: DOWN KEY
Dynamite: RIGHT KEY (every farmer needs dynamite!)

Crops:
Green Weed: quickly destroy it to avoid loosing, 7 of it on the field and you are dead
Pumpkin: wait until they are orange and harvest if for coins!
Strawberries: Harvest them when they turn red; they can be harvested 3 times
Cactus: simple. don't. touch. them.

This is my very first game ever programmed and I am quite proud of it!
